    About

    Howdy! I'm Morgan, a multi-media artist with a passion for storytelling. Whether that be through film, theater, or paper, you'll catch me pouring all my heart and soul into bringing whimsical stories to life. I graduated this Spring with my Bachelors of Science in 2D Animation from a Toonboom COE, Utah Valley University.

    Currently, I am diving head first into enhancing my storyboarding portfolio, building my business, and creating puppets with natural and reclaimed materials. Otherwise, I'm at the gym- climbing, lifting or doing jiu jitsu. That lovely inspired feeling hits me most when goofing around with family and friends, when tending to the chickens with my love, or when sketching the world around me.

    Thank you!

    I appreciate you stopping by. Come again soon! :)

    Mycelial Network

    Capitol reef

    Plein Air at Fruita, Capitol Reef

    • Service: Watercolors and Brush Pen

    Coral trout mermaid

    Light Box Expo's Monthly Character Design Challenge on the Discord. May coincides with Tom Bancroft's Mer-May Challenge.

    • Service: Alcohol Markers and Oil Pastel

    Dandelion faeries

    My siblings and I as dandelion fairies. Our age differences reflected in the growth cycles of one of my favorite flowers. Adaptable and resilient.

    • Service: Watercolor

    Maelfyra

    Another DND character sketch. Weaver of dreams. Roller of Pumpkins. Maker of Mischief. Inspired by "Froudian" Troll Illustrations.

    • Service: Col-erase Pencil and Brush Pen

    Matthew in blue

    A portrait of my love I made when we first started dating.

    Send it
